company_context: NGINX | F5 F5 NGINX Products Deploy applications faster and with more confidence than ever before. Get to know NGINX One An Architecture for Modern Applications F5 NGINX provides a suite of products that together form the core of what organizations need to create apps and APIs with performance, reliability, security, and scale. Products Modernize apps at scale with high-performance app delivery spanning monoliths to microservices. NGINX One The core NGINX data plane software enhanced with SaaS-based tools for observability, management, and security. F5 WAF for NGINX and F5 DoS for NGINX Comprehensive WAF security and denial-of-service (DoS) defense solutions designed to protect apps and APIs from layer 7 attacks. NGINXaaS for Azure An Infrastructure-as-a-Service version of NGINX that enables you to deliver secure and high-performance apps, deployed straight from the Azure Marketplace. F5 NGINXaaS for Google Cloud Enhance app delivery and security in Google Cloud without the operational toil: Accelerate performance, strengthen protection, and improve visibility at scale, while keeping costs optimized. NGINX One Components NGINX Plus An all-in-one, cloud-native load balancer, reverse proxy, web server, content cache, and API gateway. F5 WAF for NGINX A comprehensive WAF security solution designed to protect apps and APIs from layer 7 attacks. NGINX Instance Manager Identify, secure, manage, and monitor all NGINX Open Source and NGINX Plus instances in your organization. NGINX Ingress Controller Implements unified API gateways, load balancers, and ingress controllers across Kubernetes environments and provides insights into app health and performance. NGINX Gateway Fabric Streamlines app, service, and API connectivity across hybrid and multicloud Kubernetes environments with a unified app delivery fabric. NGINX One Console Configure, secure, monitor and manage NGINX instances at scale with NGINX One management console. Awards and Recognition 2024 TrustRadius Top Rated Award Resources Featured Our design vision for NGINX One: The ultimate data plane SaaS NGINX One takes the core NGINX data plane software you're familiar with and enhances it with SaaS-based tools for observability, management, and security. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their application delivery and security. I came across F5 NGINX and saw that you're using their products to modernize your apps. Can you tell me a little bit about your current infrastructure and how you're using NGINX?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Okay, fine. We're using NGINX to deploy our applications, and it's been working well for us so far. But I'm not sure what this has to do with your product. We're happy with our current setup.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's great to hear that NGINX is working well for you. However, I'd like to introduce you to DeepData AI, which can help you take your application delivery to the next level. Our solution provides real-time data processing and analytics, which can help you optimize your app performance, security, and scalability. We've seen significant improvements in companies that have integrated our solution with NGINX.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) I'm not sure we need another solution on top of what we already have. We've just implemented NGINX and we're still getting used to it. Plus, I'm not sure about the cost. We're on a tight budget, and I don't think we can afford to add another expensive solution to our stack.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about cost and timing. However, I'd like to assure you that our solution is designed to be cost-effective and can actually help you save money in the long run by optimizing your resource utilization. As for timing, we can provide a seamless integration with NGINX, and our team can work with you to ensure a smooth onboarding process. Would you be open to a demo to see how our solution can benefit your organization?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (hesitant) I'm not sure...I'd need to talk to our engineering team and get their buy-in before we can even consider another solution. And like I said, we're on a tight budget, so I'm not sure we can afford it.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that you need to discuss this with your team, and I'm happy to provide any information you need to make a decision. However, I'd like to offer you a personalized demo that can address your specific pain points and show you the value that DeepData AI can bring to your organization. We've had success with similar companies, and I believe we can do the same for you. Can I schedule a demo for next week?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (firmly) No, I don't think so. We're not interested in adding another solution to our stack right now, and we're happy with our current infrastructure. I appreciate your time, but I think we'll have to pass on DeepData AI.

analysis.raw:
Score: 2
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should have more effectively addressed the buyer's budget concerns and provided a clearer value proposition to overcome the price objection. Sentiment: Negative
